languages.text: "Не помню, чтобы {name} фон Валанциус спрашивал{mf||а} совета, как семейству Версериан лучше поступить в сложившейся ситуации. Будь внимательнее, Махарий, сосредоточься на вопросах Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: "Не помню, чтобы {name} фон Валанциус спрашивал{mf||а} совета, как семейству Версериан лучше поступить в сложившейся ситуации. Будь внимательнее, Махарий, сосредоточься на вопросах Вольного Торговца".
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "I cannot remember {name} von Valancius seeking your advice on what House Werserian should do in this situation. Pay attention, Macharius, focus on the Rogue Trader's questions."

languages.text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスはこの状況でウェルザリアン家はどう動くべきかの助言を求めたのではありません。気をつけなさい、マハリウス。自由開拓者の問いに集中しなさい」
languages.original_text: "I cannot remember {name} von Valancius seeking your advice on what House Werserian should do in this situation. Pay attention, Macharius, focus on the Rogue Trader's questions."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスはこの状況でウェルザリアン家はどう動くべきかの助言を求めたのではありません。気をつけなさい、マハリウス。自由開拓者の問いに集中しなさい」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人似乎并没有问你这种情况下韦尔森家族该应如何应对。请你专心回答行商浪人的问题，马卡里乌斯。”
languages.original_text: "I cannot remember {name} von Valancius seeking your advice on what House Werserian should do in this situation. Pay attention, Macharius, focus on the Rogue Trader's questions."

traits.locale_text: “这种情况下韦尔森家族该应如何应对，{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人似乎并没有问你。请你专心回答行商浪人的问题，马卡里乌斯。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas souvenir que {name} von Valancius vous ait demandé votre avis sur ce que la maison Werserian devrait faire en pareil cas. Essayez donc de vous concentrer sur les questions {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Macharius. »
languages.original_text: "I cannot remember {name} von Valancius seeking your advice on what House Werserian should do in this situation. Pay attention, Macharius, focus on the Rogue Trader's questions."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas souvenir que {name} von Valancius vous ait demandé votre avis sur ce que la maison Werserian devrait faire en pareil cas. Essayez donc de vous concentrer sur les questions {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}, Macharius. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «No recuerdo que {name} von Valancius le haya pedido consejo sobre lo que debería hacer la casa Werserian en esta situación. Preste atención, Macharius, y responda a las preguntas {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: "I cannot remember {name} von Valancius seeking your advice on what House Werserian should do in this situation. Pay attention, Macharius, focus on the Rogue Trader's questions."

traits.locale_text: «No recuerdo que {name} von Valancius le haya pedido consejo sobre lo que debería hacer la casa Werserian en esta situación. Preste atención, Macharius, y responda a las preguntas {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann mich nicht erinnern, dass {name} von Valancius Euch um Euren Rat gebeten hat, was Haus Werserian in dieser Situation tun sollte. Gebt bitte Acht, Macharius, konzentriert Euch auf die Fragen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: "I cannot remember {name} von Valancius seeking your advice on what House Werserian should do in this situation. Pay attention, Macharius, focus on the Rogue Trader's questions."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann mich nicht erinnern, dass {name} von Valancius Euch um Euren Rat gebeten hat, was Haus Werserian in dieser Situation tun sollte. Gebt bitte Acht, Macharius, konzentriert Euch auf die Fragen {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin}."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "{name} von Valancius Hazretleri'nin, mevcut durumda Werserian Hanesi'nin nasıl bir yol alması gerektiğiyle hususunda senden tavsiye istediğini hatırlamıyorum. İyi dinle Macharius, Hür Tacir'in sorularına odaklanmıyorsun."
languages.original_text: "I cannot remember {name} von Valancius seeking your advice on what House Werserian should do in this situation. Pay attention, Macharius, focus on the Rogue Trader's questions."

traits.locale_text: "Mevcut durumda Werserian Hanesi'nin nasıl bir yol alması gerektiğiyle ilgili {name} von Valancius Hazretleri'nin senden tavsiye istediğini hatırlamıyorum. İyi dinle Macharius, Hür Tacir'in sorularına odaklanmıyorsun."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
